item.title: My First Blog Post!
item.description: Hi! This is my first post. I still haven’t figured out what sort of content I want to write about (engineering? baking? gardening?), but generally, I’d like to spend some time talking about whatever interests me, including hobbies and work. I just started a new job at Twitch after a few months on the interviewing circuit. Here are some stats: in total, I interviewed with about 25 companies. Of those companies, I completed 12 phone screens, and 5 of them let me skip directly to the onsite.
